(I did post damage, Shadow Stalker)


Double Punch:


Double Punch saw the missiles coming, and fired two missiles at two of the 
oncoming missiles.  But he wasn't fast enough for fire at the third one, and 
it exploded against his chest, sending his invisible skid plates flying back 
several feet, smashing to the ground.
